comments:
1. In Windows, associate Paint with *.bmp files.
2. In the Preferences Dialog, make sure you have *.bmp defined in the File 
Editors page and that the editor is the default editor (which will use Paint).
3. Go to the Java Perspective, Packages view.  Go to a package that has 2 *.bmp 
files.
4. Double click on one of the *.bmp files.  Paint is opened for the file.
5. Double click on another *.bmp file.  Try to close this file.  I get the 
following walkback.
